actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the residential energy credit shall apply to qualified energy conservation expenditures made by certain landlords of energy savings attributable to such expenditures are passed through to the tenants.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit landlords to claim a residential energy credit for energy conservation expenditures with respect to rental properties if energy savings attributable to such expenditures are passed through to the tenants.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the residential energy credit shall apply to qualified energy conservation expenditures made by certain landlords of energy savings attributable to such expenditures are passed through to the tenants.
